value:
My tribe does not curry favor with
any foreign power. We maintain a
neutral position with our own might.

My people have long trained in the
strong desert winds. They will not
be easily moved.

The Wind Tribe makes an excellent
healing potion. The recipe has been
a long-held secret of ours.$k$pHowever, if you should have need
of it, I would teach you the recipe.

This is special garb worn only during
the wind festival. It is usually stored
away in Reppu Castle.

Many of those whom you call Heroes
are yet children. They seem to have
taken a liking to me somehow...

I am Fuga, leader of the Wind Tribe.
You have been invited to the wind
festival by $Nf.

I feel a mighty wind coursing
through me!
My strength is born of necessity.

We must anticipate poor results from
time to time. In this life, many days
will prove disappointing.

You expect much of me, it seems.
Allow me to show my gratitude
on the battlefield.

I am Fuga. As chieftain of the Wind
Tribe, I am honored to share our
festival with Askr.

The wind carries seeds of life, but it
can also whip into a ferocious storm
capable of great destruction.$k$pIt takes no physical shape, and yet is
the embodiment of strength itself.$k$pWe of the Wind Tribe have dedicated
our very being to learning how to
live with this force's power.$k$pThe wind has forged us and
bestowed its blessings upon us.
Our lives revolve around it.$k$pNo matter how it blows, we will
continue to hold our heads high
and press forward.$k$pWe do so because we know this
truth: the wind will bring us good
fortune in our time.
Prepare for oblivion.
You are not worthy.
Wind, heed my call!
I am beyond you.
I was careless...
I am Fuga. I lead the Wind Tribe.
Hm? Is this some manner of greeting among your people?
Ah. I am honored to see so many people from other worlds taking part in our festivities.
Hayato is a skilled diviner who has mastered a number of unique skills.
I was once friends with Sumeragi, the late king of Hoshido.
The divine sword Yato... So the legends were true...
I hope you will visit Reppu Castle one day. You would be most welcome in my home.
Naturally.
Is there a problem?
Let us be off.
